import React from"react";// Coins being rendered
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Coins(props){var coin_prop=props.coin_prop;var price_change=coin_prop.price_change_percentage_24h;var price_change_color="#38b000";if(price_change<0)price_change_color="red";return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"coin",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"img-name-symbol",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"img-name",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:coin_prop.image,alt:coin_prop.id})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"coin-name",children:coin_prop.name})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"coin-symbol",children:coin_prop.symbol})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"categories",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$",coin_prop.current_price<1?coin_prop.current_price:coin_prop.current_price.toLocaleString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$",coin_prop.high_24h<1?coin_prop.high_24h:coin_prop.high_24h.toLocaleString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$",coin_prop.low_24h<1?coin_prop.low_24h:coin_prop.low_24h.toLocaleString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:{color:price_change_color},children:[coin_prop.price_change_percentage_24h,"%"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$",coin_prop.market_cap.toLocaleString()]})]})]});}export default Coins;
